name: The Last Track
description:
I made this game for the Brakeyes game jam. Everything except the font, was made by me during the week of the jam.

You play as a kid who is just trying to get to school and must traverse an ever changing path with bullies, construction, and a few alleys. Do your best to get to school while listening to your music because once it stops you cannot move. Go ahead and REWIND the music to get moving again!!
